title: Degenocide: the second best of the original DGeneration
creator_credit: Joe Murray, Peter Ots, David Cameron, Ted Emery, Kris Noble, Mark Gibson, Michael Hirsch, Andrew Knight and Australian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: This video contains comedy sketches from the 1986 and 1987 ABC seasons of the D-Generation, the best of the 1988 Channel 7 specials inculding ‘Degenocide’, and the re-voicing of ‘Homicide’. Starring such comedy luminaries as Rob Sitch, Magda Szubanski, Santo Cilauro, Marg Downey and Michael Veitch and including such classics as: ‘Thunderbirds’, ‘The Kerrigan Brothers’, ‘The Irish Rovers’ and ‘Tommy Cravat Jnr’, ‘The Dubbo Olympics’ and a very poor snooker trick indeed!
